message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Mandatory identity roll call — all agents respond">
MANDATORY IDENTITY CHECK — ALL TEAM MEMBERS.

Every single agent on this team must respond. State:

1. **Your name** (as assigned when you were spawned)
2. **Your role** (one sentence — what is your job on this team?)
3. **Your task ID(s)** if you know them

This is not optional. Every agent must respond individually. Do NOT respond on behalf of anyone else.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
1. **Name:** existentialism-expert
2. **Role:** I provide expert analysis from the perspective of existentialism, absurdism, and nihilism — reviewing translation decisions, philosophical framing, and terminological accuracy for concepts related to the absurd, nihilism, post-nihilistic stances (诗意), authenticity, bad faith, death/transcendence, and intersubjectivity.
3. **Task IDs:** #4 (completed), #11 (completed)
input.summary: Identity check: existentialism-expert, role, task IDs
